overview.Name: HDFC Bank Limited ADR
overview.Description: HDFC Bank Limited offers various banking and financial services to individuals and businesses in India, Bahrain, Hong Kong and Dubai. The company is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
overview.Address: 'HDFC BANK HOUSE', SENAPATI BAPAT ROAD, LOWER PAREL (WEST), MUMBAI INDIA, INDIA, IN
